biotools.summary: Server designed to pinpoint protein-DNA interaction sites at the base pair level.  Uses ChIP-array data, word enumeration and position-specific weight matrix updating  to search for motifs representing these interaction sites.

bioschemas.name: MDscan
bioschemas.summary: Server designed to pinpoint protein-DNA interaction sites at the base pair level.  Uses ChIP-array data, word enumeration and position-specific weight matrix updating  to search for motifs representing these interaction sites.
